title: [Effect and Safety of a New Conditioning Regimen with Chidamide and BEAM for Autologous Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation in Lymphoma].
abstract: To assess the efficacy and safety of a new conditioning regimen with chidamide and BEAM for autologous hematopoietic stem cell transplantation (AHSCT) in patients with lymphoma.
journal: Zhongguo shi yan xue ye xue za zhi
